column4: hi, i'm using the amd64 version of ubuntu, is it possible to mix amd64 and x86 package sources and is it possible to force something in /etc/apt/sources.list so that you can override the default architecture?
not yet, we haven't done multiarch but we plan to
for example, i want to use the k7 mplayer version from nerim.net but synaptic complains about not finding binary-amd64/Packages.gz :(
